scripts.build:all: npm run build:js && npm run build:cli && cpy --parents ./config/config.yml ./gamefiles/ build/bin
scripts.package:win: cd build/bin && bestzip ./windows.zip config/config.yml gamefiles types-of-mania-win.exe
scripts.package:osx: cd build/bin && bestzip ./osx.zip config/config.yml gamefiles types-of-mania-macos
scripts.package:linux: cd build/bin && bestzip ./linux.zip config/config.yml gamefiles types-of-mania-linux
scripts.package:all: npm run package:win && npm run package:osx && npm run package:linux
scripts.release:all: npm run clean && npm run build:all && npm run package:all
scripts.package:nexus: cd build/bin && bestzip ./nexus.zip config/config.yml ../../README_MOD.txt gamefiles types-of-mania-win.exe TypesOfMania_P.pak
scripts.release:nexus: npm run clean && npm run build:all && npm run start && cpy ./build/**/*.pak build/bin && npm run package:nexus
